hypothesis_content.title: Post-News Volatility Compression Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a significant crypto-related news event (headline volume spike >2 std dev), if BTC price consolidates within a 1.5% range for 4 consecutive hours while 1H RSI remains between 35-65, a directional breakout in the direction of the initial 15-minute news reaction will occur within the next 6 hours with >70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: News events create immediate emotional reactions followed by institutional reassessment. The 4-hour compression represents institutional digestion period. Breakout typically follows initial reaction direction as delayed institutional flows execute. Current neutral regime with regulatory news provides ideal test environment.
entry_conditions: Crypto news headline volume > 2 standard deviations above 30-day average
BTC trades within 1.5% range for 4 consecutive hours post-news
4H closing price remains within consolidation range
Entry on breakout above/below 4H consolidation range (whichever direction matches initial 15-min news reaction)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 2.5% move from entry in direction of breakout
exit_conditions.time_exit: 6 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout success rate <60% over 50+ occurrences across multiple news types, or mean reversion after breakout occurs >40% of time.
